SEARCH
Package com.orders.cabinet.controller.user

Class OrderManipulationController

java.lang.Object
com.orders.cabinet.controller.user.OrderManipulationController
@RestController @RequestMapping("${user.orders}") public class OrderManipulationController extends Object
Controller for order manipulation operations.

This controller allows shops to get new orders, confirm, cancel, and complete orders.

Since:
2024-07-19
